scenario: In 2024, Bob has an Adjusted Gross Income (AGI) (or contribution base) of $171,252.35. Bob makes a charitable contribution of $110,165.16 in cash to a public charity. Under I.R.C. § 170(b)(1)(G), the deduction is limited to 60% of the contribution base.
question: Calculate the allowable charitable deduction for 2024.
answer_explanation: The deduction is limited to 60% of AGI ($102,751.41). Since the contribution ($110,165.16) is compared to the limit, the allowable deduction is $102,751.41.
reasoning: Calculated limit and compared to contribution.
